name: XE037 Healing
XE037 Rapid Healing
XE037 Cell Breakdown
XE037 Rejection
desc: Flesh stiching itself together is never a fun time. Testing.
The ache of your muscles and bones mending temselves grows.
Liquified flesh stings as your bone heats. Anymore XE037 is a gamble with death himself.
Black ooze creeps from your wounds as numbness sets in...
apply_message: You slam the needle in and begin to feel the sensation of flesh crawling together...
remove_message: The worst of the healing is over now.
miss_messages: A sick squlesh is heard from your insides...

name: Nausea Medicine
desc: Medicine calms your sotmach and helps prevent vomitting.
apply_message: You pop a pill into your mouth. Bitter.
